title: can i do it?
body:
hey... i just got a new laptop, a hp pavilion x360, and got lol. I installed d3_dx_39.dll, but when i try to start a game it says
 League of Legends.exe - Bad image-
 C:\ Windows\SYSTEM32\d3dx9_39.dll is either not designed to run on windows or it contains an error.

anybody can help?

replies.body:
Hey Kamequazi,

It sounds like DirextX is not installed correctly.
Try taking a look at this article from Microsoft http://support.microsoft.com/kb/179113/en-AU it goes through how to install the latest version of Direct X.

If you still experience issues, please feel free to post here again or submit a Support Ticket.

-ToxicHawk

>I installed d3_dx_39.dll

That's some very weird terminology. Did you actually copy the .dll file itself into the folder?
Where did you install DirectX9 from?
